  * 14 Days - $10,900
  * April 13 - 26, 2024
  * April 12 - 25, 2025

 **Highlights:**

  *  __Yoshino – a center of the “Sakura” (cherry blossoms)
  *  __Cradle of Buddhism and pilgrimage destination at Koyasan
  *  __Mt Daisen National Park
  *  __UNESCO World Heritage Site Shirakawa-go
  *  __Matsumoto and the Black Crow Castle
  *  __Sacred Island of Myiajima
  *  __Free Day at Mt Fuji

## Japan – Cherry Blossoms  
and Mount Fuji

## Munich to Istanbul

  * 35 Days - $24,750
  * May 4 - June 7, 2024
  * May 3 - June 5, 2025

 **Highlights:**

  *  __Historical cities such as Split, Dubrovnik, Budapest, the  
Meteora Monasteries in Greece and the sites of ancient Troy and Ephesus in
Turkey

  *  __Motorcycling along the Croatian coastline, the Turkish Sea of  
Marmara, the Carpathian Mountains of Transylvania and the Austria’s back
country

  *  __An afternoon at the Plitvice Lakes in the mountainous area of Central Croatia –  
A UNESCO World Heritage site

  *  __Two free days in Greece: one in a top spa & wellness hotel in the Greek  
mountains and the other on the “Green Island” of Thassos

## Barcelona to Lisbon

  * 14 Days - $9,800 
  * May 11 - 24, 2024
  * May 10 - 23, 2025

 **Highlights:**

  *  __Breathtaking riding in the Pyrenees and Picos de Europa National Park
  *  __The tiny principality of Andorra tucked into the mountains  
between France and Spain

  *  __Free Day in Pamplona with an optional ride into France
  *  __Santiago de Compostela, which is the end of the famous epic pilgrimage trail
  *  __Cantabrian Coast, with one of the most beautiful Spanish villages
  *  __Two nights in Porto, known for its port wine production

## Scotland -  
Castles, Kilts and Whisky

  * 11 Days - $9,500
  * June 17 - 27, 2024
  * June 14 - 24, 2025

 **Highlights:**

  *  __Two nights in the historical capital of Scotland, Edinburgh
  *  __Overnight accommodation and visits to several historical castles
  *  __Visiting and tasting whisky at a few of the well-known  
whisky distilleries

  * __Two-night stay in the popular seaside town of Oban
  *  __Riding to the Northern tip of Great Britain
  *  __Riding along the banks of two of the most well-known  
lochs in Scotland, Loch Lomond and Loch Ness.

## Norwegian Midnight Sun

  * 16 Days - $10,300
  * July 6 - 21, 2024
  * July 22 - August 6, 2024
  * July 5 - 20, 2025

 **Highlights:**

  *  __Crossing the Arctic Circle
  *  __A ferry to the Lofoten Islands
  *  __A ride through Finnish Lappland
  *  __Ferry ride on the "world’s most beautiful fjord": Geiranger Fjord
  *  __Norway’s most famous passroad - "Trollstigen"
  *  __The North Cape - the northernmost point in the world  
that is accessible by motorcycle

## Viking Run

  * 15 Days - $8,900 
  * July 23 - August 6, 2024
  * July 23 - August 6, 2025

 **Highlights:**

  *  __North Cape
  *  __Tallin, Riga and Kaunas – historic cities of the Baltic State
  *  __Medieval evening: dine like the knights 700 years ago!
  *  __Masurian Lakes District in Poland
  *  __Free day in Prague
  *  __Typical dishes in each of 9 countries visited

## Indian Summer in the Alps

  * 8 Days - $4,900
  * September 14 - 21, 2024 
  * September 13 - 20, 2025 

**Highlights:**

  *  __Bavarian Alps
  *  __The most famous motorcycle pass in Europe – The Stelvio
  *  __Italian Dolomites
  *  __Overnight stay in a rustic spa hotel in Warth, Austria
  *  __The smallest country in the world, Liechtenstein
  *  __King Ludwig Castle
  *  __Opportunity to stay for Oktoberfest

## Mystical Ireland -  
Emerald of the Atlantic

  * 12 Days - $8,800
  * June 1 - 12, 2024
  * May 31 - June 11, 2025

 **Highlights:**

  *  __Giant's Causeway
  *  __Cliffs of Moher
  *  __Wild Atlantic Way
  *  __Conor Pass
  *  __Ring of Kerry
  *  __Wicklow Mountains
  *  __Dublin

## Treasures of Eastern Europe

  * 10 Days - $5,800
  * June 15 - 24, 2024
  * June 14 - 23, 2025

 **Highlights:**

  *  __Five countries: Germany, Austria, Czech Republic, Slovakia, and Poland
  *  __Stunning roads
  *  __Great meals and accommodations
  *  __Interesting cultural experiences and off-bike activities

## Alps Switchback Challenge

  * 7 Days - $3,600
  * August 10 - 16, 2024
  * August 9 - 15, 2025

 **Highlights:**

  *  __4 consecutive nights at our Adventure Center in the heart of the Alps
  *  __Riding loop of Austria and Switzerland
  *  __Riding loop of Italian Dolomites
  *  __Riding loop of Tyrol and Merano areas of Italy

## Dolomites Switchback Challenge

  * 7 Days - $3,600
  * August 17 - 23, 2024
  * August 16 - 22, 2025

 **Highlights:**

  *  __From Falzarego Pass take the cable car up to Lagazuoi, which was the location  
of heavy combat in WWI

  *  __Spend time nearby city of Bolzano and visit the Oetzi Museum which is built  
around the oldest known natural human mummy (more than 5,000 years old)

  *  __Stroll around the streets of upscale Cortina d’Ampezzo where the  
1956 Winter Olympics were held

  *  __Take a ride to legendary Venice, which is less than 3 hours from our base hotel

## Iceland Adventure

  * 11 Days - $9,900
  * August 10 - 20, 2024
  * August 24 - September 3, 2024
  * August 9 - 19, 2025

 **Highlights:**

  *  __Þingvellir National Park
  *  __Gullfoss, Godafoss, and Dettifoss – some of the most well-known  
waterfalls in Europe

  *  __Hekla – Iceland’s most notorious volcano
  *  __Geysir – the original geyser
  *  __Vatnajökull – the largest glacier in Europe
  *  __The West Fjords

## Bohemian Rhapsody

  * 12 Days - $8,250
  * August 31 - September 11, 2024
  * August 30 - September 10, 2025

 **Highlights:**

  *  __Stunning roads, first class hotels and highlights of 9 countries
  *  __Scenic roads along the Danube River
  *  __The medieval city of Cesky Krumlov
  *  __Two nights in Vienna
  *  __An optional boat ride into Bratislava (Slovenia)
  *  __Northern Italy’s Dolomites
  *  __A five-star hotel in St. Moritz,  
followed by a rustic, luxury spa hotel in Warth, Austria

  *  __The King Ludwig Castle

## Berlin to Budapest

  * 15 Days - $10,500
  * August 31 - September 14, 2024
  * August 30 - September 13, 2025

 **Highlights:**

  *  __Historic cities of Dresden, Wroclav and Kraków
  *  __Tatra Mountain Crossing Between Poland and Slovakia
  *  __Transalpina Pass Road and Transfagarasan Mountain Road
  *  __“Iron Gate” on the Danube River
  *  __Semenic Cheile National Park
  *  __Transylvania
  *  __Famous Old Saxon Cities of Brasov, Sibiu, Timisoara and Cluj-Napoca

## Pyrenees Switchback Challenge

  * 7 Days - $3,800
  * May 25 - 31, 2024
  * May 24 - 30, 2025

 **Highlights:**

  *  __Three nights in Barcelona
  *  __Andorra, one of the smallest countries in the world
  *  __A ride along breathtaking coast of Costa Brava
  *  __The most spectacular regions of the Spanish and French Pyrenees

## Spanish Switchback Challenge

  * 7 Days - $3,600
  * April 27 - May 3, 2024
  * April 26 - May 2, 2025

 **Highlights:**

  *  __Málaga – one of the oldest cities in the world with 2,800 years  
of history, located on the Costa del Sol (Coast of the Sun)

  *  __The historic Andalusian city of Ronda, cradle of Spanish bullfight
  *  __The canyon “El Chorro” and the mountainous backcountry  
of Ronda

  *  __Granada’s famous Alhambra and the Albaycín (old city center)
  *  __The Alpujarras (Sierra of Pastures) – a paradise for motorcyclists
  *  __El Torcal, a spectacular limestone formation

## Spain and Morocco Adventure

  * 14 Days - $7,900
  * April 13 - 26, 2024 
  * April 12 - 25, 2025 

**Highlights:**

  *  __Two nights in the imperial city of Fez
  *  __Guided walking tour of the Medina of Fez
  *  __Two nights in the Sahara
  *  __Optional night in a desert bivouac (tented camp) under  
the stars in the Sahara

  *  __Optional visit to the British Colony of Gibraltar
  *  __Andalusia, Spain, including the final night in Malaga

## Cape Town to Victoria Falls

  * 18 Days - $11,800
  * March 16 - April 2, 2024
  * March 15 - April 1, 2025

 **Highlights:**

  *  __A night in the beautiful city of Cape Town
  *  __Tradouw Pass, The Klein Karoo, Oudtshoorn
  *  __Full day game drive in Kruger National Park – home to the African Big Five
  *  __River boat safari on the Chobe River in Northern Botswana
  *  __Visit to Victoria Falls – “The Smoke that Thunders”

## Southern Cross

  * 14 Days - $8,600
  * September 14 - 27, 2024
  * September 13 - 26, 2025

 **Highlights:**

  *  __Cape Town’s Waterfront
  *  __Overnight stay at a working wine and ostrich farm
  *  __Two-night stay on the waterfront in Knysna
  *  __Zulu Community visit
  *  __Swaziland
  *  __Two nights in a luxury game lodge in Kruger National Park

## Out of Africa

  * 34 Days - $30,500
  * August 3 - September 5, 2024
  * August 2 - September 4, 2025

 **Highlights:**

  *  __Two nights in the Serengeti - safaris in the Serengeti and Ngorongoro Crater
  *  __Two nights in Botswana’s Chobe National Park
  *  __An overnight stay at Victoria Falls
  *  __Wildlife cruise on the Chobe River
  *  __Overnight stay in a luxury hotel on Cape Town’s Waterfront

## Call of the Wild

  * 14 Days - $9,000
  * September 28 - October 11, 2024 
  * September 27 - October 10, 2025 

**Highlights:**

  *  __Luxury game lodges in South Africa, Botswana and Namibia
  *  __Numerous game drives in 4-wheeled safari vehicles
  *  __A ride to Victoria Falls
  *  __A cruise on the Chobe River
  *  __Three nights at a luxury lodge in Etosha National Park

## Heart of Africa

  * 15 Days - $12,950 
  * August 3 - 17, 2024 
  * August 2 - 16, 2025 

**Highlights:**

  *  __Two days “on safari” in the Serengeti
  *  __Ngorongro Crater, adjoining the Serengeti
  *  __Gorilla safari in Rwanda
  *  __Great Rift Valley
  *  __Multiple crossings of the Equator

## Prudhoe Bay Excursion

  * 9 Days - $7,500
  * July 20 - 28, 2024 
  * July 19 - 27, 2025 

**Highlights:**

  *  __Motorcycles equipped with Continental TKC-80 dual-sport tires
  *  __View North America’s highest mountain (Mt. McKinley)
  *  __View Alaska’s wildlife
  *  __Enjoy small, rustic towns

## Alaska/Yukon Adventure

  * 13 Days - $9,400
  * July 6 - 18, 2024
  * July 5 - 17, 2025

 **Highlights:**

  *  __The "Top of the World Highway"
  *  __Free Day in the Yukon Territory
  *  __Free Day in Fairbanks
  *  __Side trip to the Arctic Circle
  *  __Overnight stay at Denali National Park
  *  __Opportunity to see bear, moose, caribou, elk, and other wildlife

## New Zealand Top Down Adventure

  * 13 Days - $9,100
  * January 30 - February 11 / November 9 - 21, 2024
  * January 28 - February 9, 2025

 **Highlights:**

  *  __The most popular attractions on New Zealand’s North  
and South Islands

  *  __Coromandel Peninsula
  *  __North Island wine country
  *  __Southern Alps
  *  __Fox and Franz Joseph Glaciers
  *  __Mt. Cook

## New Zealand Off-Road Adventure

  * 16 Days - $12,900
  * November 11 - 26, 2023
  * January 13 - 28, 2024
  * January 11 - 26, 2025

 **Highlights:**

  *  __Waitomo Glowworm Caves
  *  __Rotorua Maori cultural evening
  *  __Spectacular riding and scenery both on and off-road
  *  __An optional ride to Abel Tasman National Park
  *  __Riding along New Zealand’s spectacular West Coast
  *  __Two-night stay in the adventure capital of the world, Queenstown

## Australia and Tasmania -  
Adventure Down Under

  * 15 Days - $11,500
  * February 13 - 27, 2024 
  * February 11 - 25, 2025 

**Highlights:**

  *  __Ride Australia’s Great Ocean Road
  *  __Overnight ferry to Tasmania
  *  __Rain forest wilderness and rural back roads
  *  __Victoria’s High Country and the Australian Alps
  *  __Snowy Mountains and the Great Divide
  *  __The Blue Mountains
  *  __Sydney

## Antarctica Adventure

  * 24 Days - $18,100
  * January 13 - February 5, 2024 
  * January 11 - February 3, 2025 

**Highlights:**

  *  __Two-night stay in an exclusive resort hotel in Bariloche
  *  __Free day in Bariloche to provide the opportunity to ride  
the beautiful motorcycling roads in the area

  *  __Two-night stay in El Calafate, the point of departure  
for a day trip to the Perito Moreno Glacier

  *  __Two-night stay in Torres del Paine National Park -  
one of South America's most popular national parks

  * __ANTARCTICA! - Cruise to the Antarctic Peninsula

## Machu Picchu Excursion

  * 14 Days - $10,550
  * October 19 - November 1, 2024 
  * October 18 - 31, 2025 

**Highlights:**

  *  __The beach resort of Arica, Chile
  *  __The Andean resort of San Pedro de Atacama
  *  __Valley of the Moon
  *  __Lake Titicaca and the Floating Islands of the Uros Indians
  *  __Giant Andean Condors of the Colca Canyon
  *  __Pan American Highway
  *  __Three nights in Cuzco with visit to Machu Picchu

  * 16 Days - $12,000
  * November 9 - 24, 2024
  * November 8 - 23, 2025

 **Highlights:**

  *  __Bariloche and the “7 lakes loop”
  *  __The Patagonian Andes
  *  __Los Alerces National Park
  *  __El Chaltén and the Fitz Roy Mountain Range
  *  __The Perito Moreno Glacier
  *  __Torres del Paine National Park
  *  __Ushuaia - “El fin del mundo”

##  Ushuaia - Discover Patagonia

Home – Ayres AdventuresAyres Adventures2023-10-27T15:42:03-05:00

# Ayres Adventures – Premium Motorcycle Tours Worldwide

## Why Ayres Adventures?

**Ayres Adventures** is the world’s leading provider of Premium motorcycle
travel. We offer motorcycle tours in Africa, Asia, Europe, North America
(including Alaska and Canada), South America, Australia and New Zealand. Our
company is characterized by exciting motorcycling destinations, upscale
accommodations and meals, small to medium-sized groups, and tours that are
operated by our own experienced staff – local to the global markets that we
serve.

Please check our extensive testimonials. To quote a Chinese proverb: “To know
the road ahead, ask those coming back”.

We believe you’ll be impressed by the number of our customers who come back
again and again to experience The Ayres Adventures Style.

  * #### 2025 Motorcycle Tours

## The Ayres Adventures Style

When asked why they are so enthusiastic about recommending an Ayres Adventure
to their friends, many riders comment on how well they like our style of doing
things. So what exactly is “The Ayres Adventures Style”?

It’s a Standard of Excellence that sets us apart from other motorcycle tour
companies.
